column5: My wife bought me a Hummingbird 363 Fishfinder/gps for christmas!  Anyone have any input or feedback?  What I can find online is quite positive!  I can't wait to use it!
Of his wife TJ?? Pretty forward of you isn't it....
If it's a 'Boid.. oit's gotta be good!!!

that is a nice unit I was thinking of getting it for the ice it has alot of great features on it I know you will like it I bought a bird two years ago and love it that is why I am looking at getting the 383c portable I have always used gray scale and love them you should and will not have any trouble.
